mapper.select: SELECT /*com.prisca.user.mapper.ReserveMapper.selectRoomResveOkList */ kr.ROOM_NO AS roomNo ,kr.STATUS_CD AS statusCd ,kr.USE_YN AS useYn FROM KMC_ROOM kr WHERE 1=1 AND kr.USE_YN = 'Y' AND kr.ROOM_NO NOT IN ( SELECT ROOM_NO FROM KMC_RESV_MANAGE RESV WHERE 1=1 AND START_YMD <= #{endYmd} AND END_YMD >= #{startYmd} ) ORDER BY kr.ROOM_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KMC_RESV_MANAGE( /*com.prisca.user.mapper.ReserveMapper.insertReserveInfo */ ROOM_NO, START_YMD, END_YMD, KMC_CD, RESV_DATE )VALUES( #{roomNo}, #{startYmd}, #{endYmd}, #{kmcCd}, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') )

INSERT INTO PUBLIC.KMC_USER_FAMILY ( /*com.prisca.user.mapper.ReserveMapper.insertFamilyInfo */ KMC_CD, F_SEQ, F_NAME, F_BIRTH_YMD, F_RELATION, F_GENDER, F_RESV_YMD )VALUES( #{kmcCd}, #{seq}, #{name}, #{birthYmd}, #{familyCd}, #{genderCd}, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') )
